file_insights.description: New delegate class for handling user interactions with fasting history view

patterns_discovered: Multiple input method handling (onKey, onSwipe, onNextPage, onPreviousPage)
Comprehensive navigation support for different device input types
Delegation of view navigation methods to associated view object
gotchas_discovered: Handles key-based navigation for multiple key events
Supports both touch and non-touch device interactions

approach_outcome.primary_goal: Create input handling for fasting history screen

recommendations: Consider extracting common navigation logic to reduce code duplication
Add error handling for unexpected input events
Document the expected behavior of navigation methods
Add unit tests to cover different input scenarios
